message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'll sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $14000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $16500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $15000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $16250. It's a compromise that I think is fair considering the product's value to you.
